#text=As I was getting ready for work this morning , I noticed in the mirror that my hair was getting a bit longer than I 'd like .
#text=I resolved to go get a haircut after work .
#text=While I was at work , I researched salons .
#text=I decided on one while I was at lunch , and called to make an appointment for 5 pm .
#text=I got there about 15 minutes early , and informed the receptionist that I had an appointment .
#text=She welcomed me and asked me to have a seat .
#text=I saw and perused a few magazines and hairstyle books while I waited , and actually found a style I liked more than what I had already had in mind .
#text=Once the stylist was done with her previous client , she came to greet me .
#text=She asked what I wanted and I presented the picture I found .
#text=She said that was no problem , and took me back to the styling chair .
#text=She washed and conditioned my hair and put a cape on me .
#text=She confirmed with me again what I wanted , and set off to cutting .
#text=I sat as tiny bits of hair fell all around me .
#text=Once she was done , she blow dried and styled my hair .
#text=That 's how I got a hair cut .
